Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express, #15 Jeffrey Local and #28 Stony Island Temporary Northbound Reroute near Stony Island/Marquette
ShortDescription: NB #6 Jackson Park Exp, #15 Jeffrey Local & #28 Stony Island are rrtd via Stony Island, Marquette, Cornell, Haynes & Stony Island, then over their normal route.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express, #15 Jeffrey Local and #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, Marquette, Cornell, Haynes & Stony Island, then resume over their normal route.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near Stony Island/Marquette.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Argyle. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Argyle.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison & #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Columbus
ShortDescription: Northbound 20 Madison and  6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus due to construction near Wacker/Columbus.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #20 Madison and #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus, then recover time on Wacker Westbound due to construction near Wacker/Columbus.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
